titles.title: To provide duty-free treatment for certain foodstuffs originating in NAFTA countries.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 9/25/2001--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to provide duty-free treatment for certain food preparations that are the product of Canada or Mexico consisting of, or processed using, a material exported from the United States.
